data.comment: Today's referee, Dong Jun Lee, has blown to start the match.
In Incheon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Incheon Utd.
Gwangju have a dangerous throw-in.
At Incheon Football Stadium, Gwangju are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Felipe Silva of Gwangju gets in a strike, but is off target.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Dong Jun Lee awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
Incheon Utd's Elias Aguilar breaks free at Incheon Football Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Incheon.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Incheon Utd territory.
Dong Jun Lee awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Gwangju.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Throw-in for Gwangju at Incheon Football Stadium.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
Dong Jun Lee awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Incheon Utd.
Incheon Utd's Stefan Mugosa gets in a shot on goal at Incheon Football Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Dong Jun Lee signals a Incheon Utd throw-in in Gwangju's half.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Gwangju.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Incheon Utd.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Incheon Utd.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Incheon Football Stadium.
In Incheon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 23, Elias Aguilar scores to make it 1-0 at Incheon Football Stadium.
In Incheon Incheon Utd drive forward through Elias Aguilar. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Attention is being given to Gwangjuâ€™s Willyan and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 26, Free kick Gwangju.
Gwangju are coming forward and Park Jeong-su gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Incheon Utd at Incheon Football Stadium.
In the minute 28, Incheon Utd pushes forward through Kim Jun-beom, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Incheon Utd territory.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 30, Han Heui-hun (Gwangju) has received a yellow card from Dong Jun Lee.
Elias Aguilar gets his shot on target but fails to score for Incheon Utd.
In the minute 31, Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Gwangju.
Willyan returns to the field for Gwangju after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Incheon Utd in the half of Gwangju.
Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a Gwangju throw-in in Incheon Utd's half.
In the minute 34, Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Incheon Utd goal kick.
Can Gwangju capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Incheon Utd's half?
Important block from the Incheon Utd defence as Yeo Reum fires in a strike for Gwangju.
Gwangju's Eom Won-sang is whistled for offside at Incheon Football Stadium.
In the minute 39, Gwangju make their first substitution with Im Min-hyeok replacing Yeo Bong-hun.
In the minute 40, Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Gwangju.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, In Incheon Gwangju's Yeo Reum is caught offside.
Throw-in for Gwangju close to the penalty box.
Gwangju's Yeo Reum misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Incheon Utd goal kick.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
In the minute 45, Can Gwangju capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In Incheon, Im Min-hyeok of Gwangju is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in Gwangju.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the home team in Incheon.
Dong Jun Lee awards the home team a throw-in.
Dong Jun Lee signals a Gwangju throw-in in Incheon Utd's half.
In the minute 52, Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Incheon Utd's half?
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in the half of Gwangju.
Throw-in for Gwangju at Incheon Football Stadium.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In Incheon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 56, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
Free kick Gwangju.
Dong Jun Lee awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Incheon Utd territory.
Gwangju push upfield and Kim Chang-su gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Incheon Utd defence.
In the minute 60, Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Incheon Football Stadium.
Throw-in Gwangju.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Incheon Utd in Incheon.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
In Incheon Gwangju attack through Im Min-hyeok. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Incheon Utd at Incheon Football Stadium.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 67, Incheon Utd are pushing forward but Kim Do-hyeok's finish is wide of the goal.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
Dong Jun Lee awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 68, Play has been interrupted briefly in Incheon to check on Stefan Mugosa, who is grimacing with pain.
Incheon Utd's Stefan Mugosa is back in action after a slight knock.
Ji Eon-hak (Incheon Utd) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
Ji Eon-hak for Incheon Utd gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
In the minute 72, Park Dae-han is replacing Kim Jun-beom for Incheon Utd at Incheon Football Stadium.
Eom Won-sang is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Incheon Utd's Kim Do-hyeok gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gwangju defender.
In the minute 75, Ji Eon-hak for Incheon Utd drives towards goal at Incheon Football Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stefan Mugosa of Incheon Utd gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Gwangju at Incheon Football Stadium.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gustavo is replacing Kang Yun-gu for the home team.
In the minute 78, Incheon Utd drives forward and Elias Aguilar gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Incheon Utd have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Willyan of Gwangju smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 81, Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in the half of Gwangju.
Stefan Mugosa (Incheon Utd) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Yang Jun-ah.
In the minute 83, Incheon Utd are pushing forward but Jeong Dong-yun's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Incheon.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
Incheon Utd drive upfield and Ji Eon-hak gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gwangju defender.
Goal! Eom Won-sang gives Gwangju a 1-2 lead.
In the minute 87, Willyan with an assist there.
Dong Jun Lee awards the away team a throw-in.
In Incheon, Gwangju push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 89, Lee Eu-ddeum is on a sub for Willyan for Gwangju.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ji Eon-hak (Incheon Utd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dong Jun Lee awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Incheon Utd territory.
It's 1-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Incheon Utd's Gustavo has been booked in Incheon.
Great finish from Felipe Silva to give Gwangju a 1-3 lead.
Han Heui-hun instrumental with a fine assist.
Park Jin Seob (Gwangju) is making a third substitution, with Kim Ju-kong replacing Eom Won-sang.
